press.nitArticle: "Trusted upholstery cleaning service in the South Bank area"

services.title: Cleaning Services
services.description: We offer a complete range of upholstery cleaning and sanitization services, with professional techniques and eco-friendly products.
services.deepCleansingDesc: Deep cleaning of fabric, leather and faux leather sofas. Stain, odour, mite and bacteria removal.
services.facialTreatmentsDesc: Complete mattress sanitization with mite, fungi and stain elimination for healthier nights.
services.hairRemovalDesc: Washing and sanitization of carpets and rugs of all sizes and materials.
services.massagesDesc: Deep cleaning of car interiors, fabric and leather seats, linings and floor mats.
services.bodyTreatmentsDesc: Professional waterproofing to protect upholstery from stains and extend its lifespan.
services.manicurePedicureDesc: Cleaning and sanitization of chairs, armchairs, poufs and all types of upholstered furniture.
services.weightLossDesc: Professional curtain and drape cleaning without the need to disassemble.
services.immunityDesc: Services for offices, hotels, restaurants and commercial spaces. Chairs, sofas and carpets.
services.acneControlDesc: Elimination of pet, moisture, tobacco and food odours from your upholstery.

whyChooseUs.title: What Sets Us Apart
whyChooseUs.description: We stand out for our quality service and commitment to hygiene and every client's satisfaction.
whyChooseUs.fastResponseDesc: We come to you. Flexible scheduling to suit your availability, including weekends.
whyChooseUs.transparentDesc: Detailed quote before starting any work, with no hidden costs.
whyChooseUs.qualifiedDesc: We use biodegradable products safe for children, pets and allergy sufferers.
whyChooseUs.emergencyDesc: Satisfaction guarantee on all work. If you're not happy, we'll come back at no extra cost.
whyChooseUs.customerFocusDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. Before and after documented for every service.

gallery.title: Our Work

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Our clients' opinions are our greatest pride and motivation.

client1.name: Sofia Mendes
client1.text: My sofa had terrible stains and they made it look brand new! Professional, punctual and friendly. Highly recommend 7 Limp!

client2.name: Ricardo Almeida
client2.text: They cleaned all the mattresses and carpets in my house. The difference is incredible, especially for allergy sufferers like me. Five stars!

client3.name: Ana Ferreira
client3.text: Had the car seats cleaned â€” they were covered in kids' stains. They look brand new! Fair price and excellent service.

client4.name: Miguel Santos
client4.text: This is the second time I've called 7 Limp for sofas and mattresses. Impeccable and professional work. The best in the South Bank!

faq.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
faq.description: We've gathered the most common questions from our clients so you can clear up any doubts.
faq.q1: How long does a sofa cleaning take?
faq.a1: It depends on the size and condition of the sofa. On average, a 3-seater sofa takes 1-2 hours. Larger or heavily soiled sofas may take a bit longer.
faq.a2: Yes! We provide free, no-obligation quotes. Just send us photos of what you need cleaned and we'll respond quickly with a price.
faq.q3: Can I use the sofa right after cleaning?
faq.a3: The sofa will be damp after cleaning and needs 2-6 hours to dry naturally, depending on the material and ventilation. We recommend opening windows to speed up drying.
faq.a4: We use professional biodegradable products that are safe for children, pets and allergy sufferers. They leave no toxic residue.
faq.a5: Yes! We have specific products and techniques for natural and synthetic leather. Cleaning includes conditioning to keep the leather soft and protected.
faq.q6: Do you serve businesses and hotels?
faq.a6: Yes! We provide services for individuals, businesses, hotels, restaurants and commercial spaces. We have special rates for regular services.
